001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao.GameResultDao;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
011import java.util.List;
012import javax.inject.Inject;
013
014/**
015 * This repository holds all game results.
016 */
017public class GameResultRepository {
018
019  private final GameResultDao gameResultDao;
020
021  @Inject
022  public GameResultRepository(GameResultDao gameResultDao) {
023    this.gameResultDao = gameResultDao;
024  }
025
026  /**
027   * Adds games results to List of game results
028   * @param gameResult GameResult
029   * @return gameResultDao
030   */
031  public Single<GameResult> add(GameResult gameResult) {
032    return gameResultDao
033        .insertAndUpdate(gameResult)
034        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.single());
035  }
036
037  /**
038   * Gets all game results
039   * @param correctTeam int
040   * @param user User
041   * @return ranked results
042   */
043  public LiveData<List<GameResult>> getAll(int correctTeam, User user) {
044    return (user !=null)
045        ? gameResultDao.getRankedResults(correctTeam, user.getId())
046        : gameResultDao.getRankedResults(correctTeam);
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * clears game results
051   * @return gameResultDao
052   */
053  public Completable clear() {
054    return gameResultDao
055        .truncateResults()
056        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Gets all game results
061   * @return gameResultDao
062   */
063  public LiveData<List<GameResult>> getall() {
064    return gameResultDao
065        .getAllRankedResults();
066  }
067
068}
